1.content:
so one day your sitting on your bed, watching your favorite show, pokemon, in your mind it was the greatest show of all time and it was always awesome seeing new pokemon kick some major ass, your laying on the bed and you have your hands on your face while staring at the TV, Suddenly!!!, the TV starts shaking and glowing and flashing black and white (hah love my reference ^^, hugs for peeps who gets that reference) and your vision blacks out...

A couple hours later.... you slowly begin waking up, you open up your eyelids and you stare up at the sky, the sky was perfectly clear though it looked different from what you could recall, you slowly start sitting up and your rub the back of your head "uhhh o-www m-my head hurts, what the hell happened and where am i" you begin to take in the surroundings and you see things like 1000x times bigger then you and you start rubbing the ground underneath you and thats when you figure it out "OH MY GOD, HOW THE FU...DID THIS HAPPEN, HOW AM I SHRUNKEN!!!!" thoughts race through your mind, trying to take in what happened, you figure out that you indeed have been shrunken and from what you can tell, you've been shrunken down to 3-4 inches and you look around "i got to get somebody's help:"

and thats when the ground starts trembling and shaking from underneath you and you look up and you see a massive......
1.title: A pokemon appears!!!!

choices: grow some balls, and somehow grab the lucario's attention
11.content:
(lucario http://www.furaffinity.net/view/3720782/...) or (http://www.furaffinity.net/view/9264100/... though obviously not as slutty xD but you get my point on what he looks like)

So you get home from school (you yourself can choose which gender you are, your around 16-18 years old) after a long day from school, you are totally exhausted and think to yourself "oooh i know what I'm gonna do now, I'm going to go upstairs and flop on my bed and whip out my nintendo 3Ds and you turn on the TV, and guess what you see, your favorite episode, its pokemon DP, and its the lucario episode" you think to yourself "boy what i would do to be apart of that experience, and wow lucario is friggin awesome" but you sigh in relief because you realize its just a dream/show that will never ever be real, "but hey, i can dream can't i" and with that, you rest your head on the pillow and start dozing off....

thats when your TV starts going crazy and shaking all over the place and a white screen appears and blue rays shoot out of the TV and grab you and start pulling you into the TV (your too deep into sleep to even realize/recognize whats going on)and you disappear into the TV....

Hours later: you slowly start waking up, you shake your head and immediately grab at it, because of a minor headache you have, you grab your head and sit up "w-what t-the" you say, looking around as you take in the surroundings, all green around, trees, a pathway, benches and a fountain in the middle and ponds "hmm okay, maybe i just crashed here last night, but i don't remember ever seeing this place before" looking up, the sky is clear as day, but somethings wrong

everything is much bigger around, the surroundings like 10x bigger than you, sitting in the middle of a pathway and it also seems much bigger than you, and then it hits you "OH MY FUCKING SHIT" "I'm shrunk, and i appear to be no bigger then 4 inches" *gulps* "what did i do to deserve, i got to get back to my house and find a way to get back to normal, but wait...i don't remember this place being here before"

then moments later, loud booming footsteps start coming at your direction, you slowly turn around and see a massive (well to you that is, its just a normal lucario) lucario walking towards you, you duck down, but it never walks past you, instead it sits down on a bench near your position and it lets out a big happy sigh and the lucario says "well damn, today couldn't of been longer"

you don't know which is more unreal, the fact that there is a real life lucario standing infront of you, or the fact that it is talking.
you quickly ponder yours thoughts "well maybe i could...." (he'll figure out that he is in the pokemon world soon, i just want it to have a slow development :} ) (anyway, I'm planning on creating new chapters every other day, so not tomorrow, but the day after that..i dont know, but for now, i know im posting this and im considering posting another one tomorrow, we will see)
11.title: anthro male Lucario

info.brief_description: One day you were playing pokemon, and all of a sudden, you're sucked into the game.
info.description:
You are pulled through the TV from this strange beam, and end up waking up inside the world of Pokemon, noticing you're surroundings, you quickly realize that you are shrunken down and also notice it's nothing but Pokemon, no trainers around, but you also notice they're in the shape of anthros or just bigger than they looked...compared to your new size. Will you find help...or be the pokemons helpless toy/plaything..or get crushed trying to find help? Find out in this awesome new interactive.

Will give GP's for every chapter someones writes, really need people making chapters with me, it takes so long to write chapters now.

Rules: no 1 line chapters unless it's for choice making at the beginning.
Try to make it at least readable, i know i'm not best with grammar but it'll help out the readers knowing what's going on when it's more readable to them, then by seeing "i luv yu pl b ther3 for 3".
Try not to kill of the character quick, he or she is extremely tolerant to pain and mostly likely cannot die, but if you wish to have a death scene..then build it up first before killing the pathway :}.

Other then that, have fun and write any kinks you want in this chapter, go all out! I have no limits.
info.pretty_title: Shrunk in the world of Pokemon
